name: Handelsblatt GmbH
goal: Handelsblatt GmbH is a multimedia company in Germany offering print, digital and mobile media with its main brands "Handelsblatt" and "WirtschaftsWoche". Germany´s leading business daily "Handelsblatt" is also published in a digital English version, "Handelsblatt Global Edition". The company's strategy focuses on high-quality journalism.
interests: Audiovisual and Media, Communication, Competition, Consumer Affairs, Culture, Enterprise, External Relations, Information Society, Internal Market, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Taxation
euInitiatives:
Freedom of the press
Competition
Commercial communications
Advertising Self-regulation
Copyright and related rights
Media pluralism
